summary: Truck driver travelling along the Transamazonic Road, a huge highway in Brazil that crosses the Amazon forest, meets a prostitute and slowly becomes aware of the problems in that region.
cast: Paulo César Peréio|Edna de Cássia|Lúcio Dos Santos|Elma Martins|Natal|Fernando Neves|Wilmar Nunes|Sidney Piñon|Rose Rodrigues|Conceição Senna
title: Iracema - Uma Transa Amazônica
